snippet: The couple met in July 2006, but started dating after crossing paths again 18 months later.
lead_paragraph: Kristina Indiana Roddy and Earl Eugene Hunt II were married Saturday evening at St. Joseph Catholic Church in Alexandria, Va. Albert A. Anderson, a Roman Catholic deacon, performed the ceremony. The bride, 31, is a director of business development in New York for American Express. She graduated from Duke and received an M.B.A. from Columbia.
